name: Zernet
0:
”Alexa, turn on Zernet”
”Alexa, set my room temperature to 21 degrees”
”Alexa, make my room warmer”

des: Control your home climate with Zernet Controller and Amazon Alexa: turn the device on and off and change temperature using voice.
